sentences.en: An equilateral triangle cannot be dissected into finitely many incongruent equilateral triangles.
sentences.cn: 等边三角形不能分成有限多个不全等的等边三角形.

sentences.en: Cloth diaper may be folded in a triangle or a rectangle.
sentences.cn: 用布做的尿布可以叠成三角形或长方形.

sentences.en: Curves of constant specific impulse are traced inside the triangle.
sentences.cn: 比冲为常数的曲线则画在三角形内部.

sentences.en: Draw a figure as accurately as possible representing the triangle in question.
sentences.cn: 尽量正确地画一图形表示所论的三角形.

sentences.en: Firstly I compliment you on most of your excellent Spring issue of "Triangle".
sentences.cn: 首先,让我来夸几句,你们《三角迷踪》春季号的大部分内容都非常精彩.

sentences.en: He outlined the triangle in red.
Hollingsworth quickly becomes the centre of an uneasy sexual triangle.
sentences.cn: 霍宁沃思很快成了难解难分的男女三角关系的中心.

sentences.en: If we focus on the coefficients alone , we find Pascal's triangle again.
sentences.cn: 如果我们只注意系数, 就重新得到Pascal三角形.

sentences.en: It can measure not only the sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, a sharp pulse but also can measure other characteristics of the signal wave.
sentences.cn: 它不仅可以测量正弦波、方波、三角波、尖脉冲信号和其他具有周期特性的信号的频率，而且还可以测量它们的周期。

sentences.en: She could not just stay at home and read " eternal triangle'stories.
sentences.cn: 难道成天躲在家里看 张资平 的三角恋爱小说?

sentences.en: She plays a French woman in a love triangle with Jonathan Pryce and Christopher Walken.
sentences.cn: 她扮演一位与乔纳森·普赖斯和克里斯托弗·沃肯有三角恋关系的法国女子。

sentences.en: So, we have to find the area of the triangle.
sentences.cn: 因此我们必须求出三角形的面积。

sentences.en: The base angles of an isosceles triangle are equal.
sentences.cn: 等腰三角形的底角相等.

sentences.en: The hypotenuse is the longest side of a right triangle.
sentences.cn: 直角三角形的斜边是直角三角形中最长的边.

sentences.en: The place is a cobbled triangle.
sentences.cn: 这个地方是一块铺石子的三角地.

sentences.en: The sum of all the angles of a triangle is 180 degrees.
There was much scope for diplomacy in this triangle of kings.
sentences.cn: 这些国王间的三角关系大有施展外交手腕的余地.

sentences.en: Yes, it is like a triangle.

words.tran_cn: 由三角形组成的；有三角斑纹的
[测] 三角测量；三角形划分
把…分成三角形；使…成三角形；对…作三角测量
[数][昆][测]三角（形）；三角关系；三角形之物；三人一组

phrases.tran_cn: 三角形公理；三角不等式

trans.tran_cn: 三角形，三人一组，三角铁，三角板
trans.tran_en: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles
